quote.text: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
quote.author: Louisa May Alcott

scripture.text: Though the mountains be shaken and the hills be removed, yet my unfailing love for you will not be shaken.

message:
Hey Ms Sunshine ☀️💖

I hope today gave you at least one reason to smile because that smile of yours? It’s the reason the world feels beautiful for a couple of hours, like the sun decided to shine just a little longer.

Whether today was Good, Bad, or somewhere in between, I just want you to know something simple but true:

I’ll always be here for you.No matter what, no matter when. You’re never alone.. not on the hard days, not even in the quiet ones.

And more than anything, I hope you know how proud I am of you. Every step you take, every bit of effort you give I see it. God sees it. And it matters.

You’ve got something rare in you. Please don’t forget it Ms sunshine..You mean the world to me
